photo.capture: Who's the fairest Bin Weevil of all?
Only the best for my Bin Pet!

fun_moment.text: The time Lady Wawa hid in Dosh’s hat and he put it on!

about.fun_fact: She secretly loves to sing (but is a horrible singer!)
about.text: Polished and stylish from head to toe, Posh loves the high life. From shopping on Tycoon Island to throwing glittering parties, she can afford the best thanks to her family’s enormous fortune. She is totally devoted to her spoiled Bin Pet, Lady Wawa.
